name: Riesling Dry
description: Pleasant floral aromas, orange peel and spice notes. Beautiful acids, simply delicious. Riesling for serious Riesling fans.

name: Chardonnay
description: Impressive complexity, finesse and deep flavor. Combination of rich butter, fig and caramel. Long, rich finish. Very smooth.

name: Gew√ºrztraminer
description: Dry version, delivering rich flavors of macerated apricots and exotic ground spices. Silky and balanced, mouth watering finish.

name: Pinot Noir
description: Also known as Red Burgundy. One of the hardest vinifera varietal to grow. Taste of raspberries; smooth, round and generous.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Exhibiting aromatics that touch a range of black cherry, green olive, and herb flavors, with cedar and coffee notes.

name: Lemberger
description: Origin, Burgenland Austria. Spicy character with aromas of lilac and violet. Beautifully dry with a hint of smokey taste. Limited, very rare.

name: Blush
description: Light semi-sweet wine, classical blend of Riesling and Cabernet Sauvignon. Start sweet but finish dry thanks to nice acids.

name: Riesling
description: Range of pear, pineapple, and honey notes; all woven together with a lightly sweet finish.

name: Magic Spice
description: Dessert, sweet wine, European blend. Enjoyable hot in the winter or chilled in the summertime. Either way, it's a lot of fun, it's Magic Spice.
